original_text: The priest will bring the bird to the altar. He will tear off the head and he will burn it on the altar. The priest will pour the blood onto the side of the altar.
korean_text: 제사장은 그것을 제단으로 가져다가 그것의 머리를 비틀어 끊고 제단 위에서 불사르고 피는 제단 곁에 흘릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: The priest will bring the bird to the altar
He will tear off the head
and he will burn it on the altar
The priest will pour the blood
onto the side of the altar
